item.description:
In the season of giving, I'll share my hunky boyfriend Keanu

Aliens land on Earth with a message for all humans: live in peace or be destroyed


Cast: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly, Kathy Bates, Jon Hamm, Jaden Christopher Smith

Not much on it yet, we will confirm meeting time as the day approaches. Let's plan on meeting right around 8:00 pm or so, for a showing shortly afterwards. If the bunch is up to it, we can go for munchies and drinks afterwards, somewhere on Main St.

Check out the trailer: The Day the Earth Stood Still
item.how_to_find_us: At the entrance, or call my cell at 860-710-0300
item.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
